encyclopedia.content: Characters of Final Fantasy VII Reno (レノ, Reno) is a prominent member of the Turks, ranking directly below Tseng. He sports a lanky physique, and unkempt red hair terminating in a long ponytail. In Final Fantasy VII he has two symmetrical red tattoos across his cheekbones.
